title: [Forbidden Hills, Grasslands]
description: There is no noticeable trail through the foothills, though occasionally, there are evident patches of flattened grass or footprints that are smaller than a halfling would make.  Every once in awhile, an oversized cricket jumps from the grass, chirping as it quickly hides again amongst the wildflowers.

There is no noticeable trail through the foothills, though occasionally, there are evident patches of flattened grass or footprints that are smaller than a halfling would make.  Oversized dragonflies buzz about the hills, flitting from flower to flower with ease.
